alert.note: Alert for Benson; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 05 at 2:01PM CDT until October 06 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CDT FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 35 possible. * WHERE...Towner, Benson and Ramsey Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from 10 PM CDT this evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
